from typing import List

def min_cost_to_paint_walls(costs: List[List[int]]) -> int:
    inf = 10 * 18
    n = len(costs)
    k = len(costs[0]) if n > 0 else 0
    if k == 1 and n > 1:
        return -1
    nmin = [[0, -1], [0, -1]]
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        min1 = nmin[:]
        nmin = []
        for j in range(1, k + 1):
            mini = min1[0]
            if mini[1] == j - 1:
                mini = min1[1]
            cost = [costs[i - 1][j - 1] + mini[0], j - 1]
            nmin.append(cost)
            nmin.sort()
            nmin = nmin[:2]
    return nmin[0][0]
